room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: Had fun even though there were only 2 of us. We didn’t get out but the game master helped us till the end.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: We had a great time!  And our Game Master was very helpful. The ONLY criticism I would have is that the Casino scenario (which we picked because of the secret agent intrigue) REALLY needs to list gambling experience as a plus.  If you don't know how to gamble or how the games/bets are played, you are sunk.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: Six of us started a birthday evening here and had a blast! Our Game Master Patrick was great and explained to us what to expect. Can't wait to go again!Well worth your time and money⛏

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: I highly recommend you take friends and/or family and accept the challenge of solving the clues to see if you are intelligent enough to breakout in less than 60 mins.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: We had so much fun! Definitely worth the money. Jared did a great job. We will definitely be back!!!!!
